resources.string:
By clicking the "Confirm and Proceed to Cancel" button, you agree to the following policy:

 1. Order Cancellation:
 - If the user cancels the order, a cancellation charge will be applied.

 2. Cancellation Charge:
 - A cancellation charge is applicable and will not be refunded under any circumstances.
 - This charge is considered a convenience charge for processing the cancellation.

 3. Refund Policy:
 - All payments made for the cancellation charge are non-refundable.

By confirming your order and choosing the online pay on delivery option, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

 1. Order Confirmation:
 - By clicking the "Confirm and Proceed to Pay" button below, you acknowledge that you have reviewed and confirmed your order details, including the items, quantities, and total amount.

 2. Payment Method:
 - The payment for your order will be processed online at the time of confirmation. This payment is non-refundable under any circumstances.

 3. Delivery Confirmation:
 - By selecting the online pay on delivery option, you confirm that you will receive the ordered items at the provided delivery address.

 4. Refund Policy:
 - All payments made online for your order are non-refundable.
 - There will be no refunds for any paid orders, including but not limited to order cancellations, changes, or dissatisfaction with the delivered items.

 5. Order Changes and Cancellations:
 - Once an order is confirmed and payment is made online, no changes or cancellations can be made.

By recharging your wallet, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

 1. Wallet Recharge Confirmation:
 - By clicking the "Confirm Recharge" button below, you acknowledge that you have reviewed and confirmed the wallet recharge details, including the recharge amount and any applicable charges.

 2. Recharge Amount:
 - The minimum recharge amount is 1000 INR.
 - You can recharge your wallet with any amount greater than 1000 INR.
 - The recharge amount will be added to your wallet balance immediately after successful payment.

 3. Usage and Deductions:
 - The wallet balance can be used for various purposes, including but not limited to order payments, subscription fees, and promotional features.
 - The wallet balance will be deducted in increments based on the usage, features, and sales generated through the app.

 4. Recharge Refund Policy:
 - All wallet recharge transactions are non-refundable.
 - There will be no refunds for any wallet recharge, including but not limited to changes in sales, dissatisfaction with the app's performance, or any other circumstances.

 5. Wallet Balance Expiry:
 - The wallet balance does not have an expiration date, but app reserves the right to modify this policy in the future. Any changes will be communicated in advance.

 - After wallet recharge expiry no new orders will be there and customers will not be able to use your store to order products associated with your store.

 6. Recharge Security:
 - Ensure that you are using a secure and trusted payment method for wallet recharge. We are not responsible for any unauthorized transactions.

 7. Recharge Verification:
 - For security purposes, We may verify wallet recharge transactions through additional authentication steps.

 8. Modification of Terms:
 - We reserves the right to modify the wallet recharge policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately and communicated to users.

 9. Contact Support:
 - For any issues related to wallet recharge, please contact our customer support at support divyanshbansal169@gmail.com.

 Thank you for using the app!
